title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Transform digital experience: Accelerate AWS Partner & customer success(PEX208)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 转型数字体验：加速AWS合作伙伴和客户成功(PEX208)
abstract: Revolutionize your partner business with AWS Partner Central. Learn how successful partners reduce complexity, automate processes, and scale efficiently. Discover practical approaches to streamline customer onboarding, enhance security controls, and deliver exceptional value. Leave with actionable strategies to transform operations and strengthen customer relationships with AWS. Ideal for AWS Solution Providers and Distributors focused on accelerating growth and maximizing success.
abstract_cn: 通过AWS合作伙伴中心革新您的合作伙伴业务。了解成功的合作伙伴如何降低复杂性、自动化流程并高效扩展。探索简化客户入门、增强安全控制和提供卓越价值的实用方法。带走可行的策略来转变运营并通过AWS加强客户关系。适合专注于加速增长和最大化成功的AWS解决方案提供商和分销商。
